Description:
Vendor asking $390,000
Land, Location and Lifestyle
Rarely will you find such a quality lifestyle opportunity offered to the market in such an exciting and fast-developing location.
Located just 45 minutes southeast of Melbourne this magnificent new development is centrally located to everything a growing family could need, and provides the opportunity for the lucky new owners to build the home they've always dreamed of (STCA).
With proximity to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, St Peter's Secondary College and St Thomas the Apostle Primary School, with access to an exclusive residents-only club which has a fully-equipped gym, tennis court, pools, function room and cafe the position could not be better. There's an abundance of local parklands to explore with the kids and pets, communal barbecue areas, running tracks and even basketball courts close by.
Poised to be within walking distance of the soon to be built new town centre, proposed childcare centre, plus the Eden Village Shopping Centre, with great connection to the Berwick-Cranbourne Road, the South Gippsland Highway and the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, a truly family focused and connected lifestyle awaits.
- Amazing opportunity to snap up a quality piece of land in a developing suburb
- Property is perfectly positioned to local parklands, schools and shopping centres
- Potential for a new family to build the home they've always dreamed of (STCA)
- Proximity to the soon to be built new town centre
- Chance to purchase in a fast-developing suburb 45mins from Melbourne CBD
- Great connection to the Berwick-Cranbourne Road and the South Gippsland Highway
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Insights: 114 Thoroughbred Drive, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Brand new exceptional family living
Proudly positioned in the premier Berwick Waters Estate is this simply stunning never before lived in home, boasting an abundance of style, space and offering an outstanding lifestyle that will be the envy of your family and friends.
- Light-filled floor plan including two spacious living zones
- Beautiful kitchen with walk in pantry and quality appliances
- Low maintenance gardens with feature undercover alfresco
Further complementing this beautiful home is the fantastic location, being within walking distance to a proposed shopping precinct and short distance to Hillcrest & Rivercrest Christian Colleges, parks and playgrounds, public transport and the Monash freeway – all just moments from the idyllic village of Berwick.

Description:
Titled Land!
Why wait until 2019 or 2020 to build and cop the increase in build costs - this titled block is ready for you to build on NOW!
Great location, affordable block size, 12.5m frontage and 28m depth tick the box for a double garage, large three or four-bedroom home with space for an alfresco.
This 350m2 (approx..) block is the perfect place to build your home.
Set close to existing amenities which provide a wide array of options for schools, childcare, medical facilities, shopping and transport what more could you ask for!
This block is in Clyde North's most prestigious estate! The Delaray Estate is unlike any other - a community set in surrounds of beautifully landscaped parks and gardens, stunning wetlands with an exclusive Residents' Club at its heart - Club Delaray.
Within easy walking distance to CLUB DELARAY, residents have exclusive access to a fully equipped gym, full size tennis court, four lane lap pool and resort styled play pool, a state-of-the-art function room, parents lounge, children's playground, community garden and cafe!
Such a rich range of healthy activities for a growing family!
Whether this is for investment or your own home don't miss this opportunity - contact one of our agents today to learn how this could be your forever place to call home.
Buy at TODAY'S land and building prices and don't risk your dream home disappearing as a result of ongoing price increases!
Follow below link to Club Delaray flyover:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TwAj6EetMYI&feature=youtu.be
Contact Sean Crimmins or Don Mckenzie for further information

Description:
No Body Corporate! Separate Title Town Homes with Park Frontage! 30 SQUARES !
This is a rare opportunity to own a park facing spacious & Luxurious home in the most sought-after area in Clyde North
Located in KiloraPark estate, next to Minter Farm Berwick and Circa Estate, these Town Homes have everything a modern family hope for
These homes come with large master bedroom with walkin robes & ensuite (double vanity & double shower with tile shower base) upstairs and guest bedroom with ensuite bathroom on the ground floor, two more spacious bedrooms, powder room, four toilets, modern kitchen with large island benchtop, glass flashback, walkin pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, multiple living zones and a private backyard
Your new home luxury inclusions:
- 2 BEDROOMS WITH ENSUITE
- 4 TOILETS
- Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop
- Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Convenient walk-in pantry
- Quality carpet and quality timber look-flooring throughout
- Luxury basins and deluxe tapware
- Driveway, path and fencing
- Convenient remote control garage door
- Contemporary landscaped
- 50 year structural warranty
- Great land size
- Recycle water on tap
- Fast NBN internet speed though-out estate
These homes are located walking distance from Hillcrest Christian College & Rivercrest Christian College and future Berwick Water Town Center
Private inspections welcome. Call to obtain directions.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

Description:
TITLED LAND - READY TO BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME
Looking for a decent block size to build a dream home, look no further!
This block of 448 sqm (14x32) approx is titled and ready to build on.
The location of the land couldn't be more perfect. St Germain translates into all your personal, professional, social and recreational needs answered, at once.
Over 1500 new dwellings, from home sites to designer townhouses and contemporary apartments, will be serviced by a vibrant Town Centre complete with a major supermarket, retail shops, cafes, restaurants and more, along with childcare, a gym and office spaces.
Close proximity to well-known primary and secondary schools
Hillcrest
River crest
St Francis Xavier College- Berwick Campus
St. Catherine Primary School
Nossal High School
Casey Grammar
Berwick Grammar
Fibre optics and recycle water available to all households.-
45km to Melbourne CBD with easy access to Princes Fwy, SouthGippsland Hwy, Westernport Hwy.-
When it comes to public transport, the block is close distance to Berwick, Cranbourne , Merinda Park Stations, Monash University, Casey Hospital, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre, Doctors, pharmacies, banks, fuel stations and much more.
Contact Sam Singh on 0403 134 009 or Jay Singh on 0432 440 878 for more details

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklistshow less

Description:
An Alluring Abode with Loads of Appeal
Basking in spectacular homely appeal and with a remarkable open attitude, this gracious residence is an absolute contemporary dream!
A fantastic lifestyle investment for a first homebuyer, investor or young family, this oasis comprises of an open and spacious design throughout and impresses with a grand entrance hall leading to the light filled rear living zone. Providing a modern urban feel, it's flush with quality timber flooring, gas fire and exquisite kitchen with top of the range stainless steel appliances including a 5 burner gas stove, double dish drawer, chicly tiled splashback, walk-in pantry and stylish pendant lighting above the island counter.
Flow seamlessly out to enjoy your summer meals alfresco style upon the generous deck, it's partially covered to create a year round appeal. The formal lounge is a relaxing spot and boasts plush carpet and plantation shutters, while the master suite is neighbouring with an immaculate ensuite and the convenience of a walk-in robe. Two additional bedrooms are robed and roomy and the rumpus space between and the central bathroom is a welcome delight to both.
Additional features of this gem include, a separate laundry with rear access, separate toilet, ducted heating, remote controlled evaporative cooling, LED down lights, and a double remote garage with internal entry.
Peacefully located, a perfect opportunity to step foot into the market and in an outstanding location with only moments to, Hillcrest Christian College, Clyde Road reserve, Clyde road bus, M1 and Casey Shopping Centre.
Photo ID required at all Open for Inspections.

Description:
Former Metricon Display
Why wait to build the home of your dreams when you can have this exquisite Metricon home that has been built and styled to the highest of standards. Having been used as a showcase of what Metricon can provide, this display home is simply stunning and represents incredible value for money. Some features include:
* Four Bedrooms
* Luxurious master
- full ensuite
- spacious walk-in robe
* Separate living zones
- Leisure room
- Family room
- Dining area
* Exquisite kitchen
- Stone benchtops
- Stainless Steel appliances
- Abundance of cupboard space
- Walk-in pantry
* Ducted Heating
* Ducted Refrigerated cooling
* Decked Entertainment area
* Mature establish gardens
* Synthetic lawn areas
* Double lock up garage
* Exposed aggregate driveway
* Alarm system
* Plus so much more....
This home is simply amazing, you will want to call it your own as soon as you take your first footsteps inside the front door. Positioned in the impressive Highgrove Estate With a strong emphasis on community and open spaces, Highgrove unites four precincts around a beautifully landscaped central neighbourhood park, while smaller parks are nestled within the heart of each precinct. These parklands will provide attractive, functional surrounds for a range of community activities.
With a vacant possession upon settlement (no leaseback options) available this year to move in and call it your very own home, why would you wait any longer? Call now for more details or to register your inspection today.

Description:
Cascades on Clyde Family Living
Priced to sell, don’t hesitate!
Located in the sought-after Cascades On Clyde Estate is this young four bedroom home equipped with all the features you need and want in a home.
Perfect for those wanting to invest in property, a first home buyer or someone wanting to move into the area.
Upon entry of the home boasts a separate front lounge or study continuing into the open plan light and bright kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and ample storage.
Whilst overlooking the adjoining dining & family room with sliding doors leading to the undercover alfresco area and low maintenance yard.
The home includes spacious master bedroom at the rear of the property, with walk in robe and full ensuite and three remaining bedrooms all equipped with built in robes.
A family bathroom with separate shower, bath and toilet plus a laundry with a linen & broom closet and external access.
Additional features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, low maintenance gardens front and rear, flyscreen’s throughout, ceiling fans to all rooms, double lock up garage with remote control & internal access.
Cascades offers easy living with access to local shops, public transport, parks, schools and much more. Be sure to come and inspect 16 Naas Road Clyde North as soon as possible as the availability of properties like this won’t last long.
DON'T MISS, a good flexible house layout with a front lounge room that can be converted to 5TH BEDROOM / HOME OFFICE / STUDY ROOM / GAME ROOM !
This lovely home is located walking distance from
- St Peters College Cranbourne Campus
- St Thomas the Apostle Primary School
- Selandra Rise Shopping center
- Bus Stop
- Waterfront with boardwalks
- Selandra Rise primary school
and a short drive from
- Cranbourne East Primary School

- Hunt Club
- Monash Freeway (M1) Access
- Cranbourne Railway Station

- Case Fields

- Casey Stadium
and many more conveniences.
Land Size :400m2
For all enquiries & inspection bookings, contact Hayley on 0488 049 143 or info@allaboutsales.com.au

Brand New, Park Front. Walk to Swimming Pool, Gym and Tennis Court
UpHill Real Estate proudly presenting this Exuberant Henley built home in Deleary Estate, Clyde North
Park Front and with views of the Dandenong Ranges, you will be impressed from the moment you step inside this stunning & unique family residence at every level!
With striking street appeal and an open plan living design, this immaculately presented home provides plenty of room to accommodate a big or growing family, comprising of large master bedroom overlooking the park with walkin robes & ensuite, three spacious bedrooms with walkin robes, separate living upstairs, spacious kitchen with island benchtop with breakfast bar, walkin pantry, under-mount 900mm Cooktop & oven, Dishwasher, separate meals and living space opening to a covered alfresco and a landscapped backyard ideal for summer BBQ.
This home comes with
- Front and back landscaping including wooden deck to alfresco
- Designer kitchen with island bencthop with breakfast bar
- Under-mount 900mm 5 burner Cooktop and Oven
- Dishwasher
- High Ceilings
- Downlights in hallway, kitchen, meals, family and living upstairs
- Ducted Heating
- Evaporated Cooling
- Floorboards to hallway, kitchen, meals and family
- Quality carpets to bedrooms, staircase and living upstairs
- All bedrooms with walkin robes
Your new home is located walking distance from

Description:
PALATIAL HOMEMOST SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION!
CLYDE NORTH: Berwick Waters Estate: This ultra luxurious family home, located in the highly sought-after Berwick Waters Estate is a dream come true. This house translates into modern living of the highest order offering quality, style, immaculate finishes and décorwhile being at the most ideal location!
This uptown property takes your breath away even before you set your first step inside. Set on a great sized land block of 512 sqm approx., with a built area of a whopping 37 squares approx, this Simonds Homes house is nothing short of Grand!
The gorgeous façade leads to a breathtaking grand entrance hall with Italian porcelain tiles and high ceilings (9-foot). What awaits you next is a stunning formal living room, guest bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe and a separate powder room. The family's privacy is taken care of by the beautifully spacious open plan kitchen, dining and family living area! Let the sunshine fill your day
Be prepared to be floored by the kitchen which is fully equipped with all the modern facilities and with quality stainless steel appliances, beautiful Caesarstone bench tops, the large island, ample sleek cabinetry, soft close drawers throughout and a walk-in pantry leaves no stone unturned to leave the missus completely stunned!
Upstairs there is the exquisite master bedroom with a full ensuite, WIR and its own private balcony offering the most alluring view! Besides there are three other good sized bedrooms all with walk in robes and a common rumpus area.
The highlights of the property include:
- 5 Bedrooms (Including 2 Master en-suites)
- Walk in robes to all 5 bedrooms
- 3 Bathrooms
- 4 Toilets including (Powder Room)
- 3 Living Areas
- 40 mm Caesarstone to kitchen Bench Top
- 900mm Electric Oven
- 900 mm Gas Cook Top
- Soft Close Drawers
- Caesar Stone Benches throughout the home
- Ducted Vacuum
- Vacuum Dustpan in kitchen
- High ceiling (9-Foot)
- Double door entry - Main entrance to the house
- Double door entry to Master bed room upstairs
- 40+ down lights and 3 pendant lights over kitchen bench
- Italian porcelain tiles in entrance hall, kitchen, family and dining areas
- Carpet in all bedrooms, Rumpus & Formal living Areas
- 2 X Split system cooling
- Data points and cabling ready to use
- Large windows giving plenty natural light
- Ample storage including under stairs and linen closet upstairs
- Double car garage (Remote/ Internal Access)
- Secure backyard
- Low maintenance front yard with beautiful 3-tiered water feature
- Back yard with quality plants, Vertical Garden and Beautiful water feature
Heating: Yes
Cooling: Yes
Dishwasher: Yes
Land Size: 512 sqm approximately
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
The Location of the house is as ideal as it gets:
- St Catherine's Catholic College (3 minutes drive)
- Hillcrest Christian College (5 minutes walk)
- Berwick Chase Primary School (5 minutes drive)
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre (5 minutes drive)
- Clyde road reserve (5 minutes drive)
- Berwick Train Station
Call Hardeep Singh now book an inspection time and make this decision you will be proud of!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Located in the sought-after area of Clyde North in the Ramlegh Springs Estate, this block of land takes full advantage of its surroundings and boast numerous benefits.
Opportunities to build your new dream home or investment are rare, so be quick to lock this titled beauty. 9 Moroak Crescent is situated on a 273m2 block of land, with 10.5m frontage x 26m depth.
Positioned close to future and existing community facilities, architect designed town centre, medical centre, sports ground and schools, this area offers a range of opportunities, perfect to build your new dream home.
In a great location, close to a wide range of local features, including a range of shopping centres, childcare, primary and secondary schools, public transport links, including Cranbourne and Berwick train station and moments away from multiple parks, wetlands, bicycle paths, Casey Fields sporting hub featuring many facilities making this block of land the perfect place that meets all your needs.

Description:
Best buy in HighGrove Estate: Park Front and Titled
Build your castle in this Titled land in HighGrove Estate!
Whether you are hoping to build a double or a single story, this titled block with 16 meter frontage is the perfect start to Spring!
Your future home is located walking distance from
- Park
- Bus Stops (Route 798)
and a short drive from
- St Peters Secondary College
- St Thomas the apostle Primary school
- Selandra Rise primary school
- Selandra Rise shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Restaurants, Medical centre)
- Clyde Shopping Centre (Coles, restaurants, McDolands, Shell, KMart, Medical centre)
- Cranbourne Town Centre
- Berwick Town Centre
- Monash Freeway inbound and outbound
- Cranbourne East Primary and secondary school
and many more conveniences
Call today to inspect the location and to obtain a copy of the Section 32. We can also assist you with choosing the perfect plan for your home

Description:
LAND IN CLYDEVALE ESTATE
CLYDE NORTH: Looking for the great location to build your dream home? There is plenty of scope to design and build your ideal floor plan either to move into or rent out.
Located just 45 minutes southeast of Melbourne and just 10 minutes from Berwick, Clydevale is centrally located to plenty of amenities that any family would need. There is 9 hectares of open land/parkland for kids to run and play, bbq areas, running tracks and basketball courts, close to plenty of established amenities, including a host of excellent schools and tertiary education options.
Selandra Rise Shopping Centre is approximately 1.5km away
St Peter's Secondary College is approximately 2km away
St Thomas Apostle Primary School is approximately 2.5km
Berwick Chase Primary School approximately 6km away
Casey Hospital is approximately 9km away
Berwick Train Station is approximately 8.5km away
Bus Route #798 is approximately 1.5km away
Casey Fields is approximately 4km away
Future Town Centre within walking distance away
Our images and photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy of the sizes mentioned. Please contact your solicitor to get the section 32 checked.

Description:
IT HAS EVERYTHING AND SO MUCH MORE !
Located in the prestigious BLOOM estate, this property offers so much for so little, don't miss out !
Step into this beautifully presented 4 bed room property and you will know that this is the one. With spacious master BR with ensuite (spectacular sized shower & WIR), 1 separate central bathroom and remote control Single lock up garage.
Internal features include Quality carpet in all bedrooms and timber look flooring in living areas and pantry, upgraded basins and deluxe tapware.
UPGRADED INCLUSIONS
- 2.7 M ceilings
- 900 mm stainless steel appliances
-stone benches & vanity
- Fully fenced
-Front & back landscaping
External features include; Driveway, path and fencing ,contemporary front landscaped garden, Estate covenants and guidelines, Recycled water on tap.
Your family can enjoy an active, social lifestyle walking to local new shops and services with large sports and activity zones
“An astute buyer / investor should not miss this rare opportunity “
*** Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

Description:
NOTHING TO BE DONE, JUST MOVE IN
CLYDE NORTH (THE BOULEVARD ESTATE): Less than 4 years old this impressive Burbank Home is positioned on 448sqm of land and offers an enviable lifestyle for any family. The property itself is around 24.3 squares under-roof line (excluding the outdoor entertainment area) and sits proudly on the block with a modern façade giving it instant street appeal.
On entry you will find the master bedroom which offers a full en suite, a large shower and a large walk in robe.
With a large open plan living zone, you will be provided with plenty of space for the growing family. The hostess kitchen provides you with quality stainless appliances, ample cupboard and bench space along with a walk in pantry. Those of you wanting extra space will be impressed with the additional separate formal lounge/ Living at the front half of the house.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then the wait is over. If you do not want to lose out, please make sure to attend the open for inspection.
Added internal and external features include;
*Two separate living areas
*High ceilings
*Down lights
*Powder room with a little sink
*Category 5 carpets with extra underlay
*Zoned ducted heating
*Extra ducts in laundry & bathrooms
*Air-conditioner
*Gas boosted solar hot water
*Customized floor to ceiling windows
*Stone bench tops to en-suite, bathroom & kitchen
*Double shower in en-suite
*Energy saving features: double glazing, extra roof insulation
*Metal fly screens & security doors to entry and laundry
*Storage: walk in linen, walk in pantry, BIR in laundry, WIR in master bedroom, BIR with *Mirrored doors in bedroom 3 and 4, and built in shelves in the garage
*Garage extension - approximately 2 meters
*Internal access from garage
*Rear roller door to garage
*Recycled water
*Sprinklers to front yard
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately six minutes' drive away from the house
- Berwick Chase Primary School is approximately four minutes' drive away from the house
- St. Francis Xavier College is approximately four minutes' drive away from the house
- Eden Rise Village Shopping Centre is approximately six minutes' drive away from the house
- Casey Central Shopping is approximately nine minutes' drive away from the house
- Clyde road reserve is approximately four minutes' drive away from the house
- Berwick Train Station is approximately eleven minutes' drive away from the house
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS**
**Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans*

Description:
Brand new house in the Berwick waters estate
Located within the walking distance from Hillcrest and Rivercrest college, parks and close to the local shopping centres, quality schools, Chisholm TAFE, Federation university, both public and private hospitals, local child care centres, Monash freeway access and all other amenities is this beautiful brand-new house proudly boasting: -
- 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR
- Spacious kitchen with quality appliances and walk in pantry
- Open plan dining and living area
- Single lock up garage with internal and remote access
Extras include: - gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, dishwasher, stone benchtops, security alarm system, solar hot water system, flyscreens, downlights, doorbell with camera, recycled water, quality blinds, light fittings and many more
Call now to inspect
